title: "USDA determined ChatGPT’s risk was ‘high,’ set up board to review generative AI use, documents show"
excerpt: "As OpenAI’s ChatGPT tool broke into the mainstream earlier this year, the U.S. Department of Agriculture determined that the generative artificial intelligence tool posed too high a risk to use on its network and prohibited its use, according to documents obtained by FedScoop."
